definition: A structured program or set of lessons designed to provide instruction, guidance, or training in a specific subject or skill. It is commonly used to refer to educational courses, training programs, or classes that aim to teach or develop knowledge, abilities, or expertise in a particular field.

examples.german: Sie hat den Kurs erfolgreich abgeschlossen.

examples.english: The course instructor is very competent.

examples.german: Ich habe den Kurs online gebucht.
